greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(x) + 2*f(x^2) + 3*f(x^9) + 6*f(x^18) in powers of x where f(x) := x / (1 + x^2).
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2) = 1, a(2^e) = 0 if e>1, a(3) = -1, a(3^e) = 4 * (-1)^e if e>1, a(p^e) = 1 if p == 1 (mod 4), a(p^e) = (-1)^e if p == 3 (mod 4).
0 = a(n) + a(n+18) + a(n+36) + a(n+54) for all n in Z.
mathematica: a[ n_] := With[ {m = Mod[n, 72], f = #/(1 + #^2) &}, SeriesCoefficient[ f[x] + 2 f[x^2] + 3 f[x^9] + 6 f[x^18], {x, 0, m}]];
results.author: _Michael Somos_, May 24 2015
